item.title: Hacker News Top Stories: Friday, August 30, 2024 at 4:20 AM UTC
item.description:
1. The secret inside One Million Checkboxes (678 points | 49 comments)
2. Starlink will now be free in Brazil: Musk (30 points | 6 comments)
3. Bypassing airport security via SQL injection (1282 points | 294 comments)
4. Anthropic's Prompt Engineering Interactive Tutorial (156 points | 23 comments)
5. Elasticsearch is open source, again (363 points | 206 comments)
6. I'm blocking connections from AWS to my on-prem services (63 points | 27 comments)
7. JPMorgan's Python training for business analysts and traders (86 points | 32 comments)
8. Google Closure Library has been archived (89 points | 41 comments)
9. Visit Bletchley Park (48 points | 15 comments)
10. Chrome is entrenching third-party cookies that will mislead users (309 points | 143 comments)
11. SDL3 new GPU API merged (79 points | 28 comments)
12. Launch HN: CodeViz (YC S24) – Visual maps of your codebase in VS Code (124 points | 47 comments)
13. Imbue (Formerly Generally Intelligent) (YC S17) Is Hiring a Research Scientist ( | hide)
14. Show HN: Amine – Prevents you from switching 100s of Browser Tabs (26 points | 2 comments)
15. Firewall rules: not as secure as you think (61 points | 31 comments)
16. Predicting the Future of Distributed Systems (4 points | discuss)
17. Can solar costs keep shrinking? (243 points | 386 comments)
18. DuckDuckGo for Mac is now open source (68 points | 25 comments)
19. Raspberry Pi Pico does line rate 100M Ethernet (192 points | 29 comments)
20. Early Scenes: Remembering a Childhood in the South Bronx (7 points | 1 comment)
21. Mastering ISO 8583 Message Networking with Golang (20 points | 4 comments)
22. Show HN: A discovery-focused search engine for Hacker News (125 points | 24 comments)
23. Californians can now add their mobile driver's license to Google Wallet (36 points | 25 comments)
24. OpenAI is good at unminifying code (855 points | 289 comments)
25. Judges rule Big Tech's free ride on Section 230 is over (345 points | 392 comments)
26. Show HN: An open-source, local-first Webflow for your own app (172 points | 44 comments)
27. Show HN: Homemade automated solar concentrator (263 points | 69 comments)
28. How I learned to stop worrying and love userspace networking (148 points | 38 comments)
29. Judge rules $400M algorithmic system illegally denied Medicaid benefits (322 points | 91 comments)
30. Launch HN: Patchwork (YC S24) – Automatically add structured logs to your code (77 points | 26 comments)
